title: As Drought Drops Water Level in the Mississippi, Shipwrecks Surface and Worries Rise
description: The river known for its vast reach and powerful currents has withered to levels not seen in decades, choking shipping lanes and endangering drinking water supplies.
dc:creator: Rick Rojas
media:credit: Lucy Garrett for The New York Times
media:description: The wreckage of the Diamond Lady, what used to be a casino boat, is now exposed in Memphis because of the receding water levels of the Mississippi River.
